```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(googledrive)
library(tidyverse)

```


## Upload to dive
Data
```{r}

## Finalized data folder url
final_files_url <- " "

## Upload weather data **UPADATE FILE PATH AND NAME**
drive_upload(media = paste0(getwd(),"/project.XX/FILE_NAME.csv"),
             path = as_id(finalized_url),
             name = "FILE NAME",
             type = "csv")



```

Metadata Doc

```{r}
## Upload metadata
# **UPDATE FILE NAME** last_name_topic_metadata

drive_upload(media = here::here("metadata_doc/metadata_doc.docx"),
             path = as_id(final_files_url),
             name = ".docx",
             type = "docx")
```

xml file

```{r}
# **UPDATE project ID and EDI ID**

drive_upload(media = here::here("project.XX/edi.XX.xml"),
             path = as_id(final_files_url),
             name = "edi.XX.xml")

```
